title: ASI has no plans to remove Ganesh Idols from Qutub Minar complex, maintain status quo, says court - The Indian Express
content: ASI has no plans to remove Ganesh Idols from Qutub Minar complex, maintain status quo, says court  The Indian Express
description: The National Monuments Authority (NMA) had asked the Archaeological Survey of India (ASI) to retrieve two Ganesha idols from the Qutub Minar complex where the Authority’s chairman says the “placement of the idols is disrespectful” and move them to the National Museum.
